text: Avarkal (atil evvalavu kalam iruntanar enpatait) tankalukkul kettarintu kollum poruttu ivvaru (nittirai ceyyum) avarkalai nam eluppinom. Avarkalil oruvar (marravarkalai nokki) ‘‘ninkal evvalavu neram nittiraiyil iruntirkal?'' Enru kettar. Atarku avarkalil cilar ‘‘oru nal allatu oru nalil ciritu pakam (iruntiruppom)'' enru kurinar. (Marravarkal) ‘‘ninkal nittiraiyilirunta kalattai unkal iraivantan nankarivan'' enru kuri ‘‘unkalil oruvaritam inta (velli) nanayattaik kotuttu avaraip pattinattirku anuppivaiyunkal. Avar (anku cenru) nalla unavup porul etu (enkirukkiratu) enpatait tetipparttu atil ciritu vanki varavum. Eninum, unkalai(p pattinattiliruppavarkalil) oruvarum arintu kollatavaru mikka eccarikkaiyakave avar natantu kollavum
